definition: to blend into one another/to blend together well
muddy/to mix
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
body/form/style/system/substance/to experience/aspect (linguistics)

sentences.english: The whole five major parts are unified one entity.
sentences.chinese: 全篇五大部分浑然一体，首尾相应。

sentences.english: The houses seem to blend into the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 这些屋子与乡村景色浑然一体。

sentences.english: Confucius, where the two are seamless.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子那里，两者是浑然一体的。

sentences.english: Bibo stone bridge and a clean seamless, Waterscape King Bridge, complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 石桥与碧波清流浑然一体，水景桥景，相得益彰。

sentences.english: A friend without faults will never be found.
The houses seem to blend into the surrounding scenery.
sentences.chinese: 这些房子和周围的景色浑然一体。

sentences.english: She combines fireplace and bookshelf ably rise, one integrated mass.
sentences.chinese: 她把壁炉与书架巧妙地结合起来，浑然一体。

sentences.english: As far as appearance and manners were concerned, Burton seemed a man all of a piece.
sentences.chinese: 从外表和举止来看，伯顿好像是个浑然一体的人。

definition: to fuse together (idiom)/hypostatic union (religion)
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
to set each other off nicely
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
to contrast/to set off one another/to go well with
to fit tightly (idiom)/to join seamlessly/to fit snugly
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
strewn at random/disorderly/untidy/irregular/uneven
sense of beauty/aesthetic perception
to reflect/to shine
to link/to join/link/connection
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
to complement one another (idiom)
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
